Water quality data

Source: R/Dataset_Documentation.R
Wq3S_Cam.Rd

A dataset containing water quality data collected from sites in Cambodia in the 3S river basin from October 2004 to December 2014

Wq3S_Cam

Format

A dataframe with 406 rows and 26 variables:

Name

Site name

Year

Calendar year of measurement

Month_1

calendar month of measurement as a number

Month

Calendar month of measurement as an abbreviation

TEMP_C

Water temperature in degrees centigrade

pH

pH

TSS_mgL

Total Suspended Solids in mg/L

COND_mSm

Conductivity, microSeimens/m

Ca_meqL

Calcium, mEq/L

Mg_meqL

Magnesium, mEq/L

Na_meqL

Sodium, mEq/L

K_meqL

Potassium, mEq/L

ALK_meqL

Alkalinity, mEq/L

Cl_meqL

Chloride, mEq/L

SO4_meqL

Sulphate, mEq/L

NO32_mgL

Total Nitrite and Nitrate, mg/L

NH4N_mgL

Ammonium, mg/L

TOTN_mgL

Total Nitrogen, mg/L

TOTP_mgL

Total Phosphorus, mg/L

DO_mgL

Dissolved Oxygen, mg/L

CODMN_mgL

Chemical Oxygen Demand, mg/L

Ca_Mg

Calcium/Magnesium, ratio

Na_Cl

Sodium/Chloride, ratio

Na_K

Sodium/Potassium, ratio

Ca_SO4

Calcium/Sulphate, ratio

NH3_mgL

Ammonia, mg/L

...

Source

Mekong River Commission
